TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentStructureProvider

summary.span: Definisce un metodo per l'aggiunta della parte di XML Paper Specification (XPS) a un pacchetto XPS.

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Per ulteriori informazioni sul `DocumentStructure` elemento di un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] del pacchetto, vedere il capitolo 9 nel [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere all'indirizzo [XPS: specifica e download di licenza](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed

summary.span: Aggiunge la parte di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] a un pacchetto di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)].

span.span: Adds the part of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

returns.span: che rappresenta la parte di un package di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)].

span.span: An that represents the part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Per ulteriori informazioni sul `DocumentStructure` elemento di un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] del pacchetto, vedere il capitolo 9 del [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere all'indirizzo [XPS: specifica e download di licenza](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
